Description.Text: Village Family Motor Inn is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Launceston. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, balcony/terrace. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Village Family Motor Inn caters to your needs.
